subject: Re: Article That Should Help Testing: "Five Habits of Highly Profitable Software
msgSnippet: Yes, sorry.  I meant to say JUnit 4, the version that requires Java 5. ... put in
messageBody:
Yes, sorry. I meant to say JUnit 4, the version that requires Java 5.

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Kent Beck" <kentb@...> wrote:
>
> Simon,
>
> I was wishing Robert had used JUnit 5 so we'd know what features to
put in
> :-)
>
> Cheers,
>
> Kent Beck
> Three Rivers Institute
>
>
> _____
